title: Deals: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 3 $200 off, Anker Gold Box sale from $14, more
content:
All of today’s best deals are headlined by a $200 discount on Samsung’s Galaxy Z Flip 3. That’s alongside an Anker Gold Box sale with Android accessories from $14 and Microsoft’s Surface Duo 2 at $500 off. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

description: Samsung's Galaxy Z Flip 3 has fallen to a new Amazon low following a $200 discount. That's alongside an Anker Gold Box sale from $14.
